Data Fields

pjmedia_snd_stream_info Struct Reference
[Portable Sound Hardware Abstraction]

Data Fields

pjmedia_dir dir
int play_id
int rec_id
unsigned clock_rate
unsigned channel_count
unsigned samples_per_frame
unsigned bits_per_sample
unsigned rec_latency
unsigned play_latency

Detailed Description

Stream information, can be retrieved from a live stream by calling pjmedia_snd_stream_get_info().

Field Documentation

pjmedia_dir pjmedia_snd_stream_info::dir

Stream direction.

int pjmedia_snd_stream_info::play_id

Playback dev id, or -1 for rec only

int pjmedia_snd_stream_info::rec_id

Capture dev id, or -1 for play only

unsigned pjmedia_snd_stream_info::clock_rate

Actual clock rate.

unsigned pjmedia_snd_stream_info::channel_count

Number of channels.

unsigned pjmedia_snd_stream_info::samples_per_frame

Samples per frame.

unsigned pjmedia_snd_stream_info::bits_per_sample

Bits per sample.

unsigned pjmedia_snd_stream_info::rec_latency

Record latency, in samples.

unsigned pjmedia_snd_stream_info::play_latency

Playback latency, in samples.
